title.bibl: The Chicago Daily News, (Morning Edition) May 19, 1891. Welsh Want Representation at World’s Fair

div.bibl: The Chicago Daily News, (Morning Edition) May 19, 1891. WELSH WANT REPRESENTATION AT WORLD’S FAIR

body.p: A delegation of Welshmen, including Messrs Powell, Smith, Ap Maddoc and Job, called on the director-general yesterday. They desire that one week during the fair shall be set apart for their nationality, when national games will be played, national bands be present and they will offer prizes to the amount of $30,000 which will then be competed for.
